name: Goofball Goals
description:
Goofball Goals is a very happy soccer game of Sumotori style. Play soccer (football) with all your emotions.
Your goofy characters are hard to control, but once you understand how to deal with them, you can position them at the ball to kick it far.
The two included mini game show off the 3D physics model of the game featuring physical character interactions. Tap the screen to throw balls at goofy men.
The characters will try to balance themselves, and/or fall over like a ragdoll, then try to stand up.

The match time is one minute, just like in every sports. The only In-App Purchase removes the timer and enables game settings, such as more balls.

Apple-A6 or -A7 CPU is recommended.
